name: Cradle of Rome
description: Build the heart of the Ancient Roman Empire and become its Emperor! This legendary city was one of the most beautiful and powerful capitals to have ever existed in the ancient world! Resurrect the masterpieces of Roman architecture. The Coliseum will make a good training school for your brave gladiators.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98/ME/2000/XPProcessor: 1000 MHz CPUMemory: 256 MB RAMGraphics: 32 MB Video CardDirectX®: 8

reviews.review_text: Played on the DS first but loved the fact I found it on pc. One of my favourite games of this sort. Easy to play, good graphics, and decent price. (I bought in a bundle of three)
